title: Ostinato Horror - Horror/Terror Music Pack
description: A package of 10 horror songs with different levels of stress + loops + stems + stingers for your game.
longDescription:
LISTEN the audio here (Soundcloud)


This flexible package will allow you to dynamically develop a terrifying environment for your game. The package contains:


1. 10 musical pieces with different characteristics and instrumentation:


#1 Bodies in the Mist: An unclear melody of a slow and gloomy step (2 levels)

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 64bpm

- # of Files: 25

- Loop Length: 1'00''/16 bars


#2 Death Stare: A disturbing musicalization to give dynamism to horror and nullity to the conciliation of sleep. (2 Levels)

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 110bpm

- # of Files: 23

- Loop Length Level 1: 1'09''/32 bars

- Loop Length Level 2: 0'34''/16 bars


#3 Gruesome Chase: A haunting ostinato to keep your nerves on edge.

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 134bpm

- # of Files: 15

- Loop Length: 0'57''/32 bars


#4 Forgotten Battlefield: A dystopian and bleak sound to take away all hope.

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 63bpm

- # of Files: 21

- Loop Length: 1'46''/28 bars


#5 Hypnosis: The sound of a spiral that attracts you towards madness. (4 levels)

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 98bpm

- # of Files: 32

- Loop Length on each Level: 0'39''/16 bars


#6 Dance Macabre: An hypnotic loop for the devil to dance to the rhythm of drums. (2 levels)

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 55bpm

- # of Files: 33

- Loop Length: 1'09''/16 bars


#7 Pulse Stress: A haunting pulse to develop everlasting stress to the player through music and noise.

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 59bpm

- # of Files: 16

- Loop Length: 1'05''/16 bars


#8 Smile in the Dark: A mocking melody of something demonic that lurks in the dark. (2 levels)

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 124bpm

- # of File: 25

- Loop Length: 2'03''/64 bars


#9 Song of the Deep: The music of an dangerous creature dwelling in the deep.

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 49bpm

- # of File: 15

- Loop Length: 1'18''/16 bars


#10 The Creature: The sound of a strange creature watching you, waiting for the right moment. (2 levels)

Watch a demo HERE (Youtube)


- Tempo: 89bpm

- # of File: 18

- Loop Length: 2'09''/48 bars


2. Masters already mixed ready to be integrated into the game.


3. Stems of each individual instrument, to make variations to your liking or vertical constructions. Do you want to use only one instrument? No problem! You can add the others as different events unfold and generate more dynamism.


4. Tail format: it is the audio with a tail at the end (2 to 4 bars long), ideal if you want to use it in some middleware like Fmod or Wwise and loop from the final bar to the beginning while the tail continues playing and generating a seamlessly loop or as a transition to another audio, horizontal constructions, silence, etc.


5. Loop Format: the most common for its implementation. Loops seamlessly.


5. Stress levels: some pieces of music contain variations called levels that allow the music to evolve according to the game conditions (see the levels in the list of songs)


6. Tail Stinger (Master & Stem) an audio output so that the transition from levels can be smoother.


Remember to listen to the examples and to check my other packs.


Happy gaming!


Do you need a musical production for your project? Contact me at: moisesgomezaraya@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
- Audio file types: Wav

- Sample rate: 44.1 khz

- Bit depth: 24bit

- Loopable: Yes

- Spatial: Stereo

- Tracks: 10

- # of Files: 223

- Loudness: -18 LUFS (for Master)

- Total Length: 00:13:50
